```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r Question_1}
library(tidyverse)
la_df = tibble(
  norm_samp=rnorm(8),
  norm_samp_pos=norm_samp>0,
  vec_char=c("T", "A", "N", "U", "S", "R", "E", "E"),
  vec_factor= factor(c("cat", "dog", "snake", "cat", "dog", "snake", "cat", "dog")),
)
```
## The mean of norm_samp and norm_samp_pos works but the mean of vec_char and vec_factor do not.

```{r}
la_df-tibble(
  as.numeric(norm_samp),
  as.numeric(norm_samp_pos),
  as.numeric(vec_char=c("T", "A", "N", "U", "S", "R", "E", "E")),
  as.numeric(vec_factor=factor(c("cat", "dog", "snake", "cat", "dog", "snake", "cat", "dog")))
)
```
